div.head: 哽咽
div.div: choking [on a foreign object stuck] in the gullet

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: choking [on a foreign object stuck] in the gullet

sense.def: Abbreviated Designation geng 哽. Pathological Condition of choking caused by a foreign object stuck in the throat. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 8: 療骨哽 咽不得下飲食方 , “Recipe to cure choking on a bone stuck in the gullet causing an inability to ingest beverages and food”.
